title: Displaying Exhibits on Air
content:
### Displaying Exhibits in OnCue

Present documents seamlessly with OnCue's On-Air feature.

#### Steps to Display:
1. Select the document or exhibit
2. Click **On-Air**
3. Use annotation tools if needed

![Exhibit Setup](https://oncuetech.slite.page/api/attachments.redirect?id=a1227a0e-1d90-4363-80f2-822cce29ce11)

---

Explore additional tools in the OnCue Workflow Ribbon.

title: Adding Multimedia Files
content:
### Supported Multimedia Files

OnCue allows a variety of video and audio formats:

- **Video**: mp4, avi, mpg, mov
- **Audio**: mp3, wav, m4a

To add files:
- Use the **Add Media** tab
- Drag and drop into the Audiovisuals panel

![Adding Files](https://oncuetech.slite.page/api/attachments.redirect?id=c1277e4b-cb27-43f6-9977-07aaf9298694)

title: About Synchronized Transcripts
content:
### Synchronized Transcripts

To play deposition video, you'll need a sync file.

- Accepted formats: `.mdb`, `.cms`, `.xml` (OnCue only)
- No sync? You can still generate reports using plain-text `.txt`

![Transcript Sync](https://oncuetech.slite.page/api/attachments.redirect?id=4d884ad9-3494-4277-8089-42acae348e05)
